entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023
